text:genesis-logos.title: The Logos in Genesis and John
text:genesis-logos.summary: The term Logos appears in John 1:1. Also in Greek philosophy as the rational principle of the cosmos.

trad:kabbalah-ein-sof.title: Ein Sof in Kabbalah
trad:kabbalah-ein-sof.summary: The Infinite prior to manifestation appears in Kabbalah as Ein Sof and in Vedanta as Nirguna Brahman.

trad:kabbalah-tzimtzum.title: Tzimtzum: Divine Contraction
trad:kabbalah-tzimtzum.summary: In Lurianic Kabbalah, Tzimtzum is the contraction of the Infinite to create space for the finite.

phys:photon.title: The Photon as Foundation
phys:photon.summary: Modern physics confirms that the photon is fundamental to all matter. All matter can be understood as condensed light.

astro:spiral-galaxies.title: Spiral Galaxies
astro:spiral-galaxies.summary: Most galaxies have spiral structure. The Milky Way is a barred spiral galaxy.

phys:spiral-nature.title: Spirals in Nature
phys:spiral-nature.summary: The spiral pattern appears at all scales: galaxies, hurricanes, DNA, nautilus shells.

phys:holographic-principle.title: The Holographic Principle
phys:holographic-principle.summary: The holographic principle suggests all information in a volume can be encoded on its surface.

phys:electromagnetic-spectrum.title: Electromagnetic Radiation
phys:electromagnetic-spectrum.summary: The spectrum includes radio waves through gamma rays. All are photons differentiated by frequency.

astro:lenticular-shape.title: Lenticular Shape
astro:lenticular-shape.summary: The flattened disk shape common to solar systems and spiral galaxies seen edge-on.

phys:musical-octave.title: The Musical Octave
phys:musical-octave.summary: An octave is the interval between a note and another with double its frequency.

trad:gurdjieff-octave.title: Gurdjieff Law of Octaves
trad:gurdjieff-octave.summary: Gurdjieff taught that all processes follow the Law of Seven with intervals between Mi-Fa and Si-Do.

phys:color-spectrum.title: The Color Spectrum
phys:color-spectrum.summary: The visible spectrum has seven colors corresponding to the seven densities.

trad:chakra-system.title: The Chakra System
trad:chakra-system.summary: The yogic system identifies seven energy centers with matching colors.

trad:four-elements.title: The Four Classical Elements
trad:four-elements.summary: Fire, air, water, earth appear in Greek philosophy and many traditions.

math:fractals.title: Fractals
math:fractals.summary: Fractal geometry shows many natural forms exhibit self-similarity at all scales.

trad:indras-net.title: Indra Net
trad:indras-net.summary: An infinite web with a jewel at each node, where each jewel reflects all others.

phys:bohm-implicate-order.title: Bohm Implicate Order
phys:bohm-implicate-order.summary: David Bohm proposed that the whole is folded within each part of the universe.

phys:atomic-void.title: Atomic Void
phys:atomic-void.summary: An atom is mostly empty space. Solidity is an electromagnetic illusion.

trad:vedanta-maya.title: Maya in Vedanta
trad:vedanta-maya.summary: Maya is the illusion of the phenomenal world that conceals ultimate reality.

phys:quantum-mechanics.title: Quantum Mechanics
phys:quantum-mechanics.summary: Particles are probability waves that collapse only when observed.
